This is the results of the 2.0M6 testing with JEE5-UC1 
http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/WTP_JEE5_Test_Scenarios

- Step 1 - 5 OK  
- Step 6 - Failed (Run As: Run On Server)
When you select test.jsp and try Run As, there are no servers listed.  However, you can add the project to the server, start the server and enter the URL manually to test.
Hi Raj - Can you check if this is a dup to 181271?

Hi Chuck, 

   I tried this on the WTP build that I have 0409 wtp 2.0, Step 6 failed, ie I did not see any dialog with a list of servers. And that is due to Bug 181271 which we fixed today. In my development enviornment step 6 works.

Hi Naci,
